verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> ye <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you, then shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7673>keep<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H2168>prune<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and gather <S%H622>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> thereof;

But in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto the <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2168>prune<s%> thy <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> That which groweth of its own <S%H5599>accord<s%> of thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7114>reap,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1219>gather<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of thy vine <S%H5139>undressed:<s%> for it <S%H1961>is<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> unto the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> for you; for thee, and for thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and for thy <S%H519>maid,<s%> and for thy hired <S%H7916>servant,<s%> and for thy <S%H8453>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee,
And for thy <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and for the <S%H2416>beast<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in thy <S%H776>land,<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H398>meat.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> unto thee, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> and the <S%H3117>space<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto thee <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Then shalt thou cause the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> of the <S%H8643>jubilee<s%> to <S%H5674>sound<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> shall ye make the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H5674>sound<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H776>land.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof: <S%H1931>it<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> unto you; and ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H272>possession,<s%> and ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H4940>family.<s%>

A <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> shall <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H2572>fiftieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> unto you: ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2232>sow,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H853><s%> that which groweth of <S%H5599>itself<s%> in it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1219>gather<s%> the grapes in <S%H853>it<s%> of thy vine <S%H5139>undressed.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H3104>jubilee;<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto you: ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H4465>aught<s%> unto thy <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7069>buyest<s%> aught of thy neighbor's <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5997><s%> ye shall <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H853><s%> another: <S%H251><s%>

According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> thou shalt <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> thy <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> and according unto the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> he shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> unto thee:

According <S%H6310>to<s%> the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H7235>increase<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> thereof, and according <S%H6310>to<s%> the <S%H4591>fewness<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> thou shalt <S%H4591>diminish<s%> the <S%H4736>price<s%> of it: <S%H3588>for<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the years of the <S%H8393>fruits<s%> doth <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> unto thee.

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> therefore <S%H3238>oppress<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another;<s%> but thou shalt fear thy <S%H3372>God:<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

Wherefore ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; and ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H7648>fill,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>therein<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> ye shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year?<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> we shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2232>sow,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> gather <S%H622>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> our increase: <S%H8393><s%>

Then I will <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and it shall bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> yet <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H8393>fruit<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> her <S%H8393>fruits<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3465>old<s%> store.

The <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H6783>forever:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is mine; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are <S%H1616>strangers<s%> and <S%H8453>sojourners<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me.
And in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> ye shall <S%H5414>grant<s%> a <S%H1353>redemption<s%> for the <S%H776>land.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxen <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and hath sold <S%H4376>away<s%> some of his <S%H4480>possession,<s%> <S%H272><s%> and if any of his <S%H7138>kin<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it, then shall he <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H853><s%> that which his brother <S%H4465>sold.<s%> <S%H251><s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> none to <S%H3808>redeem<s%> <S%H1350><s%> it, and <S%H5381>himself<s%> <S%H3027><s%> be <S%H4672>able<s%> <S%H1767><s%> to <S%H1353>redeem<s%> it;

Then let him <S%H2803>count<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H4465>sale<s%> thereof, and <S%H7725>restore<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5736>surplus<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H4376>sold<s%> it; that he may <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H3027>he<s%> be not <S%H3808>able<s%> <S%H4672><s%> <S%H1767><s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to him, then that which is <S%H4465>sold<s%> shall <S%H1961>remain<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that hath <S%H7069>bought<s%> it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> and in the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> it shall go <S%H3318>out,<s%> and he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> a <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in a <S%H2346>walled<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> then he may <S%H1961>redeem<s%> <S%H1353><s%> it <S%H5704>within<s%> a <S%H8552>whole<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after it is <S%H4465>sold;<s%> within a full <S%H3117>year<s%> may he <S%H1961>redeem<s%> <S%H1353><s%> it.

And <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H5704>within<s%> the <S%H4390>space<s%> of a <S%H8549>full<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> then the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H834>walled<s%> <S%H2346><s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H6783>forever<s%> to him that <S%H7069>bought<s%> it throughout his <S%H1755>generations:<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee.<s%>

But the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> them shall be <S%H2803>counted<s%> <S%H5921>as<s%> the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H776>country:<s%> they may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1353>redeemed,<s%> and they shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>jubilee.<s%>

Notwithstanding the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H272>possession,<s%> may the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1961>redeem<s%> <S%H1353><s%> at any <S%H5769>time.<s%>

And if a <S%H834>man<s%> <S%H1350>purchase<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> then the <S%H1004>house<s%> that was <S%H4465>sold,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> in the year of <S%H3104>jubilee:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> are their <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of their <S%H5892>cities<s%> may <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4376>sold;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is their <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> be waxen <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and fallen in <S%H4131>decay<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; then thou shalt <S%H2388>relieve<s%> him: yea, though he be a <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> or a <S%H8453>sojourner;<s%> that he may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> him, or <S%H8636>increase:<s%> but fear thy <S%H3372>God;<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> that thy <S%H251>brother<s%> may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> thy <S%H3701>money<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>lend<s%> him thy <S%H400>victuals<s%> for <S%H4768>increase.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and to <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> that dwelleth <S%H5973>by<s%> thee be waxen <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and be <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto thee; thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> compel him to <S%H5647>serve<s%> as a <S%H5656>bondservant:<s%> <S%H5650><s%>

But as a hired <S%H7916>servant,<s%> and as a <S%H8453>sojourner,<s%> he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, and shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of jubilee: <S%H3104><s%>

And then shall he <S%H3318>depart<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee, both <S%H1931>he<s%> and his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his own <S%H4940>family,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are my <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4376>sold<s%> as <S%H4466>bondmen.<s%> <S%H5650><s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> over him with <S%H6531>rigor;<s%> but shalt fear thy <S%H3372>God.<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%>

Both thy <S%H5650>bondmen,<s%> and thy <S%H519>bondmaids,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>have,<s%> shall be <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you; <S%H4480>of<s%> them shall ye <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and <S%H519>bondmaids.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the <S%H8453>strangers<s%> that do <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> you, <S%H4480>of<s%> them shall ye <S%H7069>buy,<s%> and of their <S%H4480>families<s%> <S%H4940><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5973>with<s%> you, <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3205>begot<s%> in your <S%H776>land:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H272>possession.<s%>

And ye shall take them as an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H853><s%> for your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, to <S%H3423>inherit<s%> them for a <S%H272>possession;<s%> they shall be your <S%H5647>bondmen<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> but over your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> over <S%H251>another<s%> with <S%H6531>rigor.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H3027>sojourner<s%> <S%H1616><s%> or <S%H8453>stranger<s%> wax <S%H5381>rich<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> thee, and thy <S%H251>brother<s%> that dwelleth <S%H5973>by<s%> him wax <S%H4134>poor,<s%> and sell <S%H4376>himself<s%> unto the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> or <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> thee, <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H6133>stock<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger's<s%> family: <S%H4940><s%>
After <S%H310>that<s%> he is <S%H4376>sold<s%> he may <S%H1961>be<s%> redeemed <S%H1353>again;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H4480>brethren<s%> <S%H251><s%> may <S%H1350>redeem<s%> him:
